Sedna:

Teh femme laughted sartically "His minions are easy... Just strike 
and kill them..."said the femme"But I need all Guardians together in 
order run our plan and destroy Unicron..."

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "CatMaster o" <CatMastero@y...> wrote:
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:

> > 
> > "Outside are more of me waitting to awake"replied Sedna
> >

> >

> > sleep until we're needed" replied the femme
> > 
> > Rodimus was toughtful not sure what to do next.

> > 
> Kenzo became worried when he was that Rodimus wasn't sure of what

be
> easier.
> "How are you planning to destroy Unicron and his minions?" Kenzo 
asked
